GrandWarlordVoss.title: Grand Warlord Voss
setup: At the start of the game, [i]Invader Voss[/i] enters play “Flagship Commander“ side up.
All minion cards are put in the villain trash.  The “TCF Stalwart“ card is put into play.
Put all “Forced Deployment“ cards to the side.  Shuffle the villain deck, then put the “Forced Deployment“ cards on the bottom of the villain deck.
gameplay: When a card called “Forced Deployment“ is destroyed, [i]Invader Voss[/i] flips.
Increase damage to villain targets other than “TCF Stalwart“ by {5 - H}.
GrandWarlordVoss.advanced: This card does not increase damage to villain targets.
flippedGameplay: Reduce damage to [i]Invader Voss[/i] by 1 for each minion in play.
Whenever a minion card is destroyed, [i]Invader Voss[/i] deals himself 1 irreducible psychic damage.
At the end of the Villain turn, [i]Invader Voss[/i] deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP {H - 1} energy damage each.
GrandWarlordVoss.flippedAdvanced: This card does not cause [i]Invader Voss[/i] to deal himself 1 irreducible psychic damage whenever a minion is destroyed.
GrandWarlordVoss.challengeText: If it is not the villain turn, “Forced Deployment“ cards are indestructible.

openingLines.TempestCharacter: I shall conquer this world as easily as I did Vognild Prime.
openingLines.SkyScraperNormalCharacter: If you do not stand with your people, you shall fall before them.
openingLines.LazyFanComix.TempestRisingWindsCharacter: I will rule here, even if the land itself rises against me!

Spite.title: Spite
setup: At the start of the game, {Spite} enters play “Mutating Murderer“ side up.
The “Safe House“ card is put into play. The Villain Deck is shuffled.
gameplay: When {Spite} deals damage, he regains that much HP.
At the end of the villain turn, the top card of the villain deck is played. Then, {Spite} deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 2} melee damage.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are 5 drug cards in play, {Spite} flips.
If there are ever 5 victims in the villain trash, {Spite} wins.
If there are ever 6 cards under the Safe House card, the heroes win.
Spite.advanced: At the start of the villain turn, if there are 2 or more victim cards in play, destroy 1 Victim card.
flippedGameplay: When {Spite} flips to this side, all villain cards in play other than drugs and this card are destroyed.
Any drug card which would act at the end of the villain turn instead acts at the start of the villain turn.
Whenever a villain card would enter play, instead play the top card of the environment deck.
Spite.flippedAdvanced: At the end of the Villain turn, play the top card of the environment deck.
Spite.challengeText: Increase damage dealt by environment cards by 1.

openingLines.default: Come out, come out, wherever you are...
openingLines.TheWraithCharacter: Haven't you learned by now?  You can't save everyone.
openingLines.LazyFanComix.TheWraithImprovisedGearChar: Everything you have breaks so easily.  Your little toys.  Your little friends.

DarkMindMod.MindReaper.title: Mind Reaper
setup: At the start of the game, {MindReaper} enters play “Body-Jumper“ side up.
“Possession“ is put into play next to the hero with the highest HP. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever a villain one-shot enters play, if the hero with the highest HP is possessed, this card flips; otherwise, move “Possession“ next to them.
The first time each turn that the possessed hero would deal damage to themself, redirect that damage to the non-possessed hero target with the highest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, the possessed hero uses the power on their character card.
If “Psychic Barrier“ is in play, reduce damage to the possessed hero by 2.

The hero “Possession“ is next to is possessed. If the possessed hero is incapacitated, the heroes win. If all non-possessed heroes are incapacitated, the heroes lose. “Possession“ cannot be destroyed, flipped, or moved, except by this card.
DarkMindMod.MindReaper.advanced: At the start of the game, cards are revealed from the top of the villain deck until {H - 2} projections are revealed and put into play. Other revealed cards are shuffled back into the villain deck.
flippedGameplay: Whenever the possessed hero uses a power or draws a card, they regain {H - 1} HP.
The first time each turn that the possessed hero would deal damage to themself, redirect that damage to the non-possessed hero target with the lowest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, the possessed hero deals each non-possessed hero target 2 melee damage.
At the start of the villain turn, {MindReaper} flips.

The hero “Possession“ is next to is possessed. If the possessed hero is incapacitated, the heroes win. If all non-possessed heroes are incapacitated, the heroes lose. “Possession“ cannot be destroyed, flipped, or moved, except by this card.
DarkMindMod.MindReaper.flippedAdvanced: Whenever the possessed hero regains HP, all projections regain the same amount of HP.
DarkMindMod.MindReaper.challengeText: Whenever the possessed hero deals damage to a target, {MindReaper} deals that target 1 irreducible psychic damage.

openingLines.default: I will be flesh, and one of you will be my vessel.
openingLines.TheVisionaryCharacter: Perhaps your body will suit me.  Then again, perhaps not.
openingLines.LazyFanComix.TheVisionaryProphecyCharact: Your only future is as my host... or my victim!

SpookyGhostwriter.GoldDragon.title: Gold Dragon
powers: The next time {GoldDragon} is dealt 2 or more of either energy, fire, lightning, or cold damage, switch to his dragon character card. {GoldDragon} deals 1 target 1 energy damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Select a hero. Reduce the next damage to that hero by 2.
Select a hero. The next time that hero uses a power, they also deal 1 target 1 energy damage.

SpookyGhostwriter.GoldDragon.title: Gold Dragon
gameplay: When {GoldDragon} is dealt 2 or more damage, switch to his human character card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
Until the start of your next turn, change the damage type of damage dealt by hero targets to lightning.
